page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICOLA.
page.content: I wake up at about 7.00am .Before I have my breakfast I have to go outside and feed my pony.I give her bran, vitamins & hay.When I have given her,her breakfast I go back to the house to have my breakfast.I have Rice_Krispies.When I have had my breakfast I go and get dressed for school.We get to school about 8.50am school starts at 9.00am.My best subject is maths.We have our lunch at 12.00 am.I have sandwiches,crisps and some cake I also have an apple. Hometime is at 3.15pm.I get off the bus at Carolines stop.My mum comes to pick me up at 4.00pm.When I get home I have to muck out my pony,then tack her up to ride for about two miles.I give her bran and hay.Then I have my tea then help my mum clean up the house.Then I watch t.v. until 9.00pm then I go to bed.
